name: Dr Sahu's Physiotherapy Clinic in Bangalore
tag_list: physiotherapy-in-bangalore, physiotherapy-clinics-in-bangalore, orthopedic-and-neurological-specialists, orthopedic-and-neurological-consultants, physiotherapist-in-bangalore, physiotherapy-bangalore, physiotherapy-clinics-bangalore-
overview:
Dr. Sahu’s Physiotherapy has been established since 2009 and clinic located in Bannerghatta road Bangalore. He is expert in treating orthopedic and neurological conditions. He is also an orthopedic and neurological consultant/specialist. His clinic provides the best physiotherapy in Bangalore. His clinic comes under the premium physiotherapy clinics of Bangalore.

We provide consultation, treatment and home care services for geriatrics (old people), neurologic, orthopedic, pediatrics, post surgical patients, spine and knee problems.
